SEARCH
Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.network

Interface GameControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerInterface extends Remote
GameControllerInterface provides the methods required for controlling the game via RMI.

  • Method Details

    • placeStarterCard

      void placeStarterCard(String nickname, Orientation orientation) throws GameEndedException, RemoteException
      Places the starter card for the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      orientation - the orientation of the starter card
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game has already ended
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs

    • chooseCardFromHand

      void chooseCardFromHand(String nick, int index) throws RemoteException
      Chooses a card from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the player
      index - the index of the card to choose
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String nickname, int x, int y, Orientation orientation) throws RemoteException, GameEndedException
      Places a card on the board.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      x - the x-coordinate on the board
      y - the y-coordinate on the board
      orientation - the orientation of the card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs
      GameEndedException - if the game has already ended

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(String playerNickname, int index) throws RemoteException, GameEndedException
      Draws a card for the player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      index - the index of the card to draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs
      GameEndedException - if the game has already ended

    • isMyTurn

      boolean isMyTurn(String nick) throws RemoteException
      Checks if it is the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      true if it is the player's turn, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs

    • showOthersPersonalBoard

      void showOthersPersonalBoard(String playerNickname, int playerIndex) throws RemoteException
      Shows the personal board of another player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player requesting to see another's board
      playerIndex - the index of the player whose board is to be shown
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs

      Leaves the game.
      Parameters:
